data.name: I am Bjorn
data.detailed_description: The clock is ticking, you have 1 hour…Can you free Bjorn from his imprisoned mind? Find yourself in his deepest memory within his childhood room solving puzzles and unlocking clues to defeat his lifelong struggles. There are sights and sounds to be discovered that will reveal the past. Pick up and examine almost everything and listen CLOSELY to what Bjorn thinks about each object. Do you have what it takes to help Bjorn figure out who he is?
data.about_the_game: The clock is ticking, you have 1 hour…Can you free Bjorn from his imprisoned mind? Find yourself in his deepest memory within his childhood room solving puzzles and unlocking clues to defeat his lifelong struggles. There are sights and sounds to be discovered that will reveal the past. Pick up and examine almost everything and listen CLOSELY to what Bjorn thinks about each object. Do you have what it takes to help Bjorn figure out who he is?
data.short_description: You have 1 hour. Start your adventure inside Bjorn’s imprisoned mind. Find your way through his childhood room filled with puzzles and riddles to defeat his lifelong struggles with sight, sound and the past. Pick up and examine almost everything and listen CLOSELY to whats going on in Bjorn's mind.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista + 64 bit only
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo U9600 ,AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual-Core or equivalant.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 ,ATI Radeon HD 4890 or equivalant.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 - 64 only
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 ,AMD FX-6300 or equivalant.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2GB ,AMD Radeon R7 360 or equivalant.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
